摓字的基本解释

摓
féng
古同“缝”，缝补。
宽大：“摓衣浅带。”

摓
pěng
古同“捧”，双手托物。

摓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［féng］
［《集韻》符容切，平鍾，並。］
(1)同“縫”。以针线连缀。
(2)同“逢”。大。参见“摓衣”、“摓掖”。
(3)两手托物。参见“摓策”。
(4)同“夆”。闪烁。

摓字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摓； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页449第26
【集韻】符容切，音逢。與縫同。以鍼紩衣也。　又與逢通。【莊子·盜跖篇】摓衣淺帶。【註】逢掖大衣也。　又與捀通。奉也。【史記·龜箂傳】摓策定數，灼龜觀兆。【註】摓謂兩手執著，分而扐之。　又【集韻】符風切【正韻】符中切，?音馮。亦與縫同。

摓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
摓字的起名意思

暂无。

Ping
Basic explanation of words
Ping
féng
The ancient same "stitched" and mended.
Leniency: "The dress is shallow."
Ping
pěng
Gu Tong "holds up", holding things with both hands.
Ping
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［féng］
["Jiyun" Fu Rongqie, Pingzhong, and. ]
(1) Same as "sewing". Connect with needles and threads.
(2) Same as "Feng". Big. See also "Gaiyi", "Gaiye".
(3) Hold things with both hands. See "Pan Policy".
(4) Same as "夆". Flashing.
Ping
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hands and Words Department] 　摓; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 449 26
【Jiyun】Fu Rongqie, sound every time. Same as seam. Take the needle to rob clothes.　And Fengtong again. 【Zhuangzi·Stealing Plantar】a shallow belt of clothes. 【Note】Fengye coats are also available.　And struck again. Bong Ye. 【Historical Records · Turtle Chai Biography】Care to determine the number, burn the tortoise and watch the signs. [Note] It means that the two hands are attached, and they are divided.　 [Ji Yun] Fu Fengqie [Zheng Yun] Fu Zhongqie,? Yin Feng. Also the same as sewing.
Ping

Ping
Name meaning
Nothing.
féng
I гл.
1) вм. 缝 (шить, зашивать)
2) держать, поддерживать
摓策定数 держа жребия, определять судьбу (гаданием)
II прил.
вм. 逢 (широкий)
